original_text: And all the inhabitants of Egypt shall know that I am the Lord, because they have been a staff of reed to the house of Israel.
korean_text: 애굽의 모든 주민이 내가 여호와인 줄을 알리라 애굽은 본래 이스라엘 족속에게 갈대 지팡이라

sentences.original_text: And all the inhabitants of Egypt shall know
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 애굽의 모든 거민이 알게 되리니

sentences.original_text: because they have been a staff of reed
